Name: Installation and upgrade of parking meter technology.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the City of New York, in relation to the installation and upgrade of parking meter technology.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
	Section 1. Subchapter two of chapter one of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-175.2 to read as follows:
	§19-175.2  Parking meter upgrade. a. The commissioner shall devise and implement a plan for the replacement of all parking meters with muni-meters by July 1, 2010.
	b.  The commissioner shall provide for an additional method of payment wherein users can pay for metered parking by using a cellular telephone payment system. The new form of payment will not replace any other existing methods of payment.
	§ 2. This local law shall take effect July 1, 2010.  



MEA
LS 4206, 4124
07.24.08
